display_long_description:
Exercise the mind, body & soul in this fast-paced feast of micro challenges, high intensity boss battles and a concoction of collectibles that unravel as you jog across vibrant backdrops of color and joy.

# RUN FOR YOUR LIFE
Get physical with lifelike jog-in-place controls or stick with the less intensive arm-swing mode as you run for your life through the bright and stylish world of madness.

[media]


# MINIGAME MADNESS

Match, Catch, Pop, Chop, Hack, Slash and Bash your way through quick-thinking showdowns that block your path forward to each castle lair!                                

[media]


# HURRY, HURRY, HURRY
It’s a race against time as every passing second drains from the longevity of your beating heart.

[media]


# MASTER THEM ALL
Master all hazard and showdown challenges with the help of collectible character cards found throughout the world. Learn their weakness and let ‘em have it!

[media]


# SUBSTANCE AND STYLE
Unlock hands and tombstones to make a statement during your run, and even after death.

[media]


# LEVEL UP
Spend the RO (Royal Offspring) that you’ve saved from each castle lair on valuable upgrades to increase your sword, shield or heart duration.

[media]

# RUN FOR YOUR LIFE

# MINIGAME MADNESS

Match, Catch, Pop, Chop, Hack, Slash and Bash your way through quick-thinking showdowns that block your path forward to each castle lair!                                

![{"height":1080,"type":"image","width":1920}](https://scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/86659801_2932247743583077_7417664589811237837_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=S7N0xdbzBs0Q7kNvwH25ptH&_nc_oc=Adm-Tf-Ppk55f1vSLOfcVhsLsTlvLUdqLATKfFcR_HNqg9KziKG3Em4AJHzMbMeiIm0&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfobQ_CjVAx5yMkM6_z9kMGmLx5XMpuUiOt5D3HVGWnu2Q&oe=6976A8EA)


# HURRY, HURRY, HURRY
It’s a race against time as every passing second drains from the longevity of your beating heart.

![{"height":984,"type":"image","width":1748}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507165_447221264980420_8367178254206728213_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=aoF01KOvxwMQ7kNvwEbxFy-&_nc_oc=AdmdDJ3BFuL9Qe6CHBPfiBWh0OW7Nh4iLBSz8qyHs7kQSRAwM-_uF0gzW6DW65-ldNk&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_Afor7gXDvkkG-Qm9uzTAM09ndNWPF7SWKaNwGXJpF7Xa-w&oe=69769952)


# MASTER THEM ALL
Master all hazard and showdown challenges with the help of collectible character cards found throughout the world. Learn their weakness and let ‘em have it!

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57570293_4078635569072597_4548948488473550523_n.png?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=gJ7DUTRwm2UQ7kNvwGkbWGu&_nc_oc=Adl4sUbipx25xlkz0FP6XWhF8sLNpnng8ZK1lULggDVgimTPSq8oFT1IG6hR3iVwreQ&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfoBbozqnfagMpeaZqo3a2mL5_IEyvyBy-k1slM47yrJqw&oe=6976A02D)


# SUBSTANCE AND STYLE
Unlock hands and tombstones to make a statement during your run, and even after death.

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982723_2208705096178691_3774754884521119372_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=p1L4mKX3JfwQ7kNvwHGdQox&_nc_oc=AdlLo0mstmewpULPX7X8NYuzS1D5sFfFSSn_tRg6oY35WrWS2B1yxyUKfMsEwL9eZak&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_Afo6goghmpTQTYS-teYRGMw6h3FPxUqu8UnaGuoScRL1rA&oe=69767C50)


# LEVEL UP
Spend the RO (Royal Offspring) that you’ve saved from each castle lair on valuable upgrades to increase your sword, shield or heart duration.

![{"height":1080,"type":"image","width":1920}](https://scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57566682_1730682357765277_5286327356836676334_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=vdf998ATp10Q7kNvwHJNufN&_nc_oc=AdlBNFut936MzI8p7KiXZ3hS7xA8ssw7DDegM67VYsaOa7Sj5yTAE5tNBq0EUEtWBWc&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfoO6mZtn9ACQsNdu8euUUu4W_xPe1wSDhcNu5uyayDItA&oe=6976A8E3)
